item.description:
Kimball Farm hosts Cruise Night, with as many as 350 cars ranging from Corvettes to Model A's. The now famous "Ultimate Cruise Night" in Westford offers the additional excitement of live local band entertainment and our delicious Kimball Farm BBQ grill. The band this night is "The Continentals"... There is also their Legendary Ice Cream Buffet. What better way is there to spend a Summer evening. Admission for the general public is $3.00 for adults and children under 12 are free.
This was lot of fun last year and afterwards we headed over to the Westford Grille for cold drinks and alot of laughs....bring a blanket or beach chair to sit on and join us for a good time. Let's gather in front of the stage area.

This event is "weather permitting"...if it needs to be canceled we can still meet for burgers and a few brews at the Westford Grille. I will post an update that afternoon if the plan changes.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the rowdy ones gathering in front of the stage!! :-)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Kimball's Cruise Night
